series.title: Guardian: The Lonely and Great God
series.plot: Kim Shin, an immortal goblin, goes to find a human bride to remove an invisible sword from his chest and end his life. One day, school student Ji Eun-Tak confesses to him that she is the chosen one.

series.title: The Uncanny Counter
series.plot: Demon hunters pose as workers in a noodle shop in an effort to catch evil spirits hoping to find eternal life.

series.title: Destined With You
series.plot: A lawyer bound by a centuries-old curse becomes entangled with a civil servant who holds the key to his freedom.

series.title: Modern Family
series.plot: Three modern-day families from California try to deal with their kids, quirky spouses and jobs in their own unique ways, often falling into hilarious situations.

series.title: See You In My 19th Life
series.plot: Ban Ji-eum, who can remember all her past lives, sets out to reconnect with a lost love from her 18th life, which was cut tragically short.

series.title: Tomorrow
series.plot: Made half-human and half-spirit by accident, a young man is employed by grim reapers to carry out special missions.

series.title: Lucifer
series.plot: Lucifer is faced with another surprise when he meets an intriguing homicide detective named Chloe, who appears to possess an inherent goodness -- unlike the worst of humanity, to which he is accustomed. Suddenly, Lucifer starts to wonder if there is hope for his soul.
